column4: when a program crashes, bug-reporter tool hangs my system even longer than necessary, how can I disable bug-repoter ?
also, this computer becomes downright slow nowadays, compared to when it had windows on it.
How do I optimize ubuntu (turn off all unnecesary processes etc...)
nah XP
try the i686 kernel, and man updeate-rc
is that suitable for a PIV thinkpad notebook ?
is it an intel cpu?
yes
then yes, the 686 kernel will give you a little speed
and how do I do that exactly ?
use synaptic, look for the most current 686 kernel
ok!
I want to try the i686 kernel, and man update-rc, is that 'kernel-image...' in synaptic ?
if you install in synaptic everything is added for you
you're not compiling your own kernel are you?
uname -a
tell me what it says
gues its ok then, :p
if it says 686, you're good to go
thanks! now maybe I'll try a lighter window manager
and see if I can get this thing up to speed
look at man updeate-rc   see if there's services you can disable...jsut dont overdo it
